Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: â€¢ Hey trendy folks, here's your scoop straight from the people on social media. Posts covered topics such as positive economic trends in Australia, calls for funding to repair rural roads from the agriculture industry, critique of the Australian government's management of the economy, a call for fair sharing of national resources, criticism of the government's benefit from income tax revenue, and allegations of politicians' screwing people over. These social media posts clearly reflect a range of opinions and concerns of Australians regarding their economy and political system.
